interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Frownies Immune Perfect Daily Moisturizer, 0.3 Ounce
Review Date: 2014/09/25
Store: FROWNIES
Product Description: ['Frownies Immune Perfect Continuous Active Hydration: Will make you experience continuous active hydration and dual protection against free radical. Helps prevent skin cell damage and helps nourish the DNA that reduces inflammation and boosts the immune system of the skin.']
Average Rating: 2.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'FROWNIES', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Item Volume': '10 Milliliters', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6 x 1.5 x 1 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '724498132578', 'Manufacturer': 'Buy Smart LLC'}
Review Text: Love, love, LOVE this moisturizer. I love it so much that I may have replaced my Avon Anew. This one costs quite a bit, but the tiny travel sized tube will last a while. This is a VERY watery product, but that's great for 2 reasons: 1) a little bit goes a long way, and 2) it absorbs really well into the skin. The best way that I have found to apply this is to tap the lotion onto my fingertips, then just sort of dab it onto my face before rubbing it in. This saves on product and keeps me from spilling any from the tube. Like I said, this has a very "wet" texture, so you won't have to use much. The price is way up there but, compared to using a lot of a cheaper product (that doesn't work as well), or a same-priced product (but using more of it), this is the best value overall. I'm going to see how long the travel-sized tube lasts while I save up for a larger size. Since this is something I have to save for, I really wish there were more size/price choices. Still, I love this and I think my skin is getting addicted to it!
Review Title: Pretty Pricey But Worth It!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare Enthusiast:** Exhibits a strong preference for moisturizers, particularly those that emphasize hydration and skin health.
- **Value-Conscious:** Willing to invest in higher-priced skincare products if they demonstrate superior efficacy, as indicated by the satisfaction with a premium price point.
- **Product Performance:** Prioritizes products that absorb well and require minimal application quantity, appreciating those with a watery or light texture.
- **Sustainability Mindset:** Shows an interest in reducing waste by using products efficiently, preferring to tap and dab rather than rub to conserve product.
- **Brand Loyalty:** Has established a preference for the FROWNIES brand, having replaced a previous favorite.
- **Desires Variety:** Expresses a wish for more size and price options, indicating a need for flexibility in product availability.
- **Long-Term Commitment:** Willing to save for larger sizes, demonstrating a commitment to incorporating effective products into their routine. 

Overall, the user values quality and efficiency in skincare, with a strong focus on hydration and skin protection.
